Description: Deals 1% of target's Max Health as Pure Damage per second
Damage Taken is increased 1% for every 5% missing Health
Reduces target's Attack Speed by 25%
Reduces healing received by 25%
Cannot Move, Attack, use abilities, or gain energy
Stunned Units cannot Move, Attack, or cast abilities
Silenced Units cannot cast abilities
Disarmed Units cannot Attack
Blinded Unit's Attacks miss.
Lethargic Units cannot gain Energy
Rooted Units cannot Move
Clumsy Units cannot Dodge
Enemy Units change Attack target to the Focused Unit in range
Untargetable Units cannot be targeted directly by Enemies
Invulnerable Units do not take Damage
Indomitable Units cannot die, their health cannot go lower than 1
Immune Units are not affected by negative effects
True Sight causes Units' Attacks to never miss
Fear/Flee causes Unit to run away from source
Charm causes Unit to move towards source
Taunt forces Units to Attack the taunter
Shield absorbs Damage before Health whilst the Shield lasts
Cleanse removes all negative effects
Chain causes effects to propagate to additional Enemies
Heal for a % of all Damage dealt
Heal for a % of all Energy Damage dealt
Heal for a % of all Physical Damage dealt
Ignores a % of Physical Resistance
Ignores a % of Energy Resistance
Each Grit reduces incoming Physical Damage by 1
Each Resolve reduces incoming Energy Damage by 1
Grit + Resolve => Reduces damage by a flat value
Physical Resist + Energy Resist
Pure Damage ignores resistances, deals exactly the mentioned damage. Can Crit.
Physical Damage deals Damage to Health and Shield, is reduced by Physical Resistance and mitigated by Grit
Energy Damage deals Damage to Health and Shield, is reduced by Energy Resistance and mitigated by Resolve

Increases the power of Omega Abilities

Increases the Damage of Critical Hits
